articles.author: Jason Owens
articles.title: Thunder vs. Pacers: Jalen Williams explodes to fend off Indiana rally as OKC takes 3-2 NBA Finals lead - Yahoo Sports
articles.description: The Thunder are one win away from an NBA championship.
articles.content:
This time, Indiana's rally fell short.
The Indiana Pacers cut an 18-point first-half deficit to two points in the fourth quarter Monday night. But the Oklahoma City Thunder did not relent and held o… [+5103 chars]
